Documentation¶

Documenting the code, especially the API, is critical to ensure that the modding tools isn’t abandoned.

Style Guide¶

All the Python code must follow PEP 8. The docstrings must follow Google’s style guide.

Building Documentation¶

The documentation framework used is Sphinx. Install Sphinx and run make html or equivalent in the documentation/ folder.
